cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on March 18, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1850, Supporting Research and Development for First Responders Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 46 (Thursday, March 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Miss RICE of New York:
H.R. 1850.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8
[Page H1358]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: Supporting Research and Development for First Responders Act
